user_stories.title: As a backend developer, I want to define a comprehensive strategy data model so that valid trading strategies can be consistently represented and stored.
user_stories.description: This story focuses on designing the database schema for trading strategies, including key attributes like strategy name, entry/exit conditions, risk parameters, and associated assets. It ensures that all necessary information for a strategy is captured systematically.
acceptance_criteria: The data model includes fields for strategy ID, name, description, and status.
The data model supports various types of entry and exit conditions (e.g., price thresholds, technical indicators).
The data model accommodates risk management parameters (e.g., stop-loss, take-profit).
The data model allows for association with multiple tradable assets/symbols.
The data model is normalized to reduce redundancy and maintain data integrity.

tasks.title: Design 'Strategy' table schema
tasks.description: Define columns and data types for the main strategy entity, including unique identifier, name, and description.

tasks.title: Design 'Condition' table schema
tasks.description: Create a table to store various entry/exit conditions, linked to the 'Strategy' table.

tasks.title: Design 'RiskParameter' table schema
tasks.description: Define schema for risk management settings, associated with strategies.

tasks.title: Design 'AssetAllocation' table schema
tasks.description: Create a table to link strategies with specific tradable assets or symbols.

tasks.title: Document data model in ERD
tasks.description: Create an Entity-Relationship Diagram (ERD) to visualize the strategy data model.

user_stories.title: As a backend developer, I want to implement the database persistence layer for strategy data so that trading strategies can be saved, retrieved, and updated reliably.
user_stories.description: This story covers the implementation of the ORM (or direct SQL) code to interact with the database, enabling creation, reading, updating, and deletion (CRUD) of strategy records based on the defined data model.
acceptance_criteria: A new strategy can be successfully inserted into the database.
An existing strategy can be retrieved by its ID.
An existing strategy's attributes can be updated.
A strategy can be soft-deleted (marked as inactive) from the database.
Data integrity constraints are enforced during all CRUD operations.

tasks.title: Implement 'Strategy' repository/DAO methods
tasks.description: Write code for create, read, update, and soft-delete operations for the 'Strategy' entity.

tasks.title: Implement 'Condition' repository/DAO methods
tasks.description: Write code for CRUD operations related to entry/exit conditions associated with strategies.

tasks.title: Implement 'RiskParameter' repository/DAO methods
tasks.description: Write code for CRUD operations related to risk parameters associated with strategies.

tasks.title: Setup database connection and configuration
tasks.description: Configure the application to connect to the chosen database (e.g., PostgreSQL).

user_stories.title: As a quality assurance engineer, I want to create automated tests for strategy persistence so that the reliability of strategy data storage and retrieval is continuously verified.
user_stories.description: This story focuses on writing unit and integration tests for the persistence layer, ensuring that strategies are correctly saved, retrieved, and modified without data corruption or errors.
acceptance_criteria: Unit tests exist for each CRUD operation on strategy entities.
Integration tests verify persistence of a complete strategy object (with conditions, risks, assets).
Tests cover edge cases such as invalid data input and missing fields.
Tests are integrated into the CI/CD pipeline.
All persistence layer tests pass consistently.

tasks.title: Write unit tests for Strategy repository/DAO
tasks.description: Develop tests for individual methods of the strategy persistence layer.

tasks.title: Write integration tests for full strategy persistence lifecycle
tasks.description: Create tests that save, retrieve, update, and delete a complete strategy object.

tasks.title: Implement rollback mechanisms for test transactions
tasks.description: Ensure tests don't leave dirty data in the test database.
